verbose_text: Tacrolimus prevents the dephosphorylation of calcineurin and suppresses the production of inflammatory cytokines (i.e., interleukin (IL)-2, IL-3, IL-4, interferon-gamma and tumor necrosis factor (TNF)-alpha from T-cells).
